summary: Harvest Admin Console testing complete. All 24 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified with all 4 tabs working correctly: Campaigns (1 active 'Weekend Door Blitz'), Templates (5 templates with icons), Rewards (5 rewards with Featured badges on AirPods and PTO), Redemptions (filter tabs working). Create modals functional for both campaigns and rewards.
critical_code_review_comments: All Harvest Admin Console API endpoints properly protected with authentication (returns 401/403 for unauthorized requests)
POST /api/harvest/campaigns creates campaign successfully with status 'active' or 'scheduled' based on start_date
POST /api/harvest/rewards creates reward successfully with all required fields
GET /api/harvest/campaigns/templates/list returns 5 default templates: Weekly Blitz, Season Long Ladder, New Rep Sprint, Storm Response, Team Battle
GET /api/harvest/rewards returns rewards with user_points, can_redeem status, and points_needed
GET /api/harvest/redemptions returns redemption history with counts for pending/approved/fulfilled
All tabs have proper data-testid attributes for testing (admin-campaigns-tab, admin-templates-tab, admin-rewards-tab, admin-redemptions-tab)
Create Campaign modal has all required fields: name, description, goal_type, target, start_date, end_date, bonus_points, icon
Add Reward modal has all required fields: name, description, category, points_required, stock, is_featured checkbox
Featured badges correctly displayed on Apple AirPods Pro and Half-Day PTO rewards
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Campaign_Admin_Console and TEST_Reward_Admin_Console via API during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Harvest Admin Console fully functional at /harvest-admin route. 4 tabs: Campaigns (1 active 'Weekend Door Blitz' + 1 test campaign), Templates (5 templates with Use Template buttons), Rewards (5 rewards - AirPods and PTO have Featured badges), Redemptions (0 pending, 0 approved, 0 fulfilled). Create modals work for campaigns and rewards. User test@eden.com is admin role.

Admin Console Route.details: Loads at /harvest-admin with 'Harvest Admin Console' header and 'Manage gamification for your team' subtitle

Campaigns Tab.details: Shows 'Campaign Management' header, 'Weekend Door Blitz' campaign with Active badge, New Campaign button

Campaign Card Details.details: Shows icon, name, Active badge, description, date range (2/5/2026 - 2/9/2026), 0 participants, 50 doors target, Leader: No entries

New Campaign Button.details: Opens Create Campaign modal with all form fields

Create Campaign Modal.details: Contains Campaign Name, Description, Goal Type dropdown, Target input, Start/End Date pickers, Bonus Points, Icon, Cancel/Create buttons

Templates Tab.details: Shows 'Campaign Templates' header with 5 templates: Weekly Blitz (‚ö°), Season Long Ladder (üèÜ), New Rep Sprint (üåü), Storm Response (üå™Ô∏è), Team Battle (‚öîÔ∏è)

Template Cards.details: Each template shows icon, name, description, duration_days, default_target, and 'Use Template' button

Use Template Buttons.details: 5 'Use Template' buttons found, functional (prompts for campaign name)

Rewards Tab.details: Shows 'Rewards Catalog' header with 5 rewards available, Add Reward button

Rewards List.details: Shows TEST_Reward_1269ba4d (500 pts), TEST_Reward_049f070a (500 pts), $50 Amazon Gift Card (1000 pts), Apple AirPods Pro (2000 pts, Featured), Half-Day PTO (5000 pts, Featured)

Featured Badges.details: Featured badges displayed on Apple AirPods Pro and Half-Day PTO

Add Reward Button.details: Opens Add Reward modal with all form fields

Add Reward Modal.details: Contains Reward Name, Description, Category dropdown, Points Required, Stock input, Featured Reward checkbox, Cancel/Add buttons

Redemptions Tab.details: Shows 'Redemption Requests' header with '0 pending ¬∑ 0 approved ¬∑ 0 fulfilled' counts

Redemption Filter Tabs.details: Pending (0), Approved (0), Fulfilled (0), All filter tabs present and functional

Empty Redemptions State.details: Shows 'No Redemptions' with 'No pending redemption requests' message

POST /api/harvest/campaigns.details: Creates campaign successfully, returns id, status, and success message

POST /api/harvest/rewards.details: Creates reward successfully, returns id and success message

GET /api/harvest/campaigns/templates/lis.details: Returns 5 templates with all required fields: id, name, description, duration_days, goal_type, default_target, reward_type, icon

GET /api/harvest/rewards.details: Returns rewards with user_points, categories, can_redeem status

GET /api/harvest/redemptions.details: Returns redemptions list with counts for pending/approved/fulfilled
